sub_title: Director Process Eng. at Fluor BV
summary: Process Director with more than 25 years experience with refinery units, chemical plants, verious petrochemical plants and utility systems. Experienced in the execution of feasibility studies, debottlenecking studies, technology evaluation, basic engineering, detailed engineering and more recently project management. Other experience includes site engineering, construction validation, pre-comissioning, commissioning and start-up assistance on several projects.

school.name: HU University of Applied Sciences Utrecht (Hogeschool Utrecht)

projects.title: SaBuCo, Al-Jubail Saudi Arabia
projects.description: Saudi Butanol Company (SaBuCo), a joint venture between three Saudi petrochemical companies namely Sadara Chemical Company (Sadara), Saudi Kayan Petrochemical Company (Saudi Kayan) and Saudi Acrylic Acid Company (SAAC). The project consists of a SynGas unit based on Linde licensed technology and a Butanol unit producing 330 kta n-butanol and 10,4 kta i-butanol based on Davy/DOW licensed technology. As a member of the PMC team, responsible as Turnover Manager.

projects.title: Tasnee, Al-Jubail, Saudi Arabia
projects.description:
Process Director in an integrated management team responsible for the development of Tasnee future projects located in Jubail 1  and Jubail 2. Future project work consisted of:
1) Tasnee Solar Towers Project a joint venture between Tasnee and Solar Tower Technologies. Preparation of an invitation to bid together with the licensor Solar Tower Technologies.
2) Chlor Alkali - Calcium Chloride Project. Preparation of an invitation to bid for a 70 kta caustic soda (100%) and 15 kta bleach (licensor UHDE), a 95 kta CaCl2 unit (Licensor SEP Salt & Evaporation Plants Ltd.) and required UI&O.
3) Tasnee PPX2 Project, development of a basis of design for a capacity increase of the existing PP Unit based on Novolen Technology.
4) Coatings & Anti-Scalant Polymer Project intended to produce 12 kta of polyacrylic acid polymer and 58 kta of emulsion polymer for coatings (DOW Technology)

projects.title: Saudi Acrylic Monomer Company, Al Jubail, Saudi Arabia
projects.description: As a member of the PMC team, responsible as Process Unit Supervisor for the crude acrylic acid unit (145 kta, licensor DOW), glacial acrylic acid unit (70 kta, licensor Sulzer), butyl acrylate unit (160 kta, licensor DOW), inhibitor unit (licensor DOW), WSA acid recovery unit (licensor Haldor Topsoe), waste water treatment plant (licensor Environ). Resident with Fluor in Greenville, USA during the development of the PDP/FEED packages (April-Nov 2009). Resident with Linde in Munich, Germany during the development of the open book estimate (OBE) and detailed engineering (Dec. 2009 - Sept. 2011) and relocated to site to support construction, pre-commissioning, commissioning and start-up (Oct. 2011 - Dec. 2013). Responsibilities at site included acting as Unit Process Supervisor, Turnover Manager and assistent Project Manager.

projects.title: Saudi Ethylene and Polyethylene Project, Al-Jubail, Saudi Arabia
projects.description: As a member of the PMC team, responsible as Process Unit Supervisor of the ethane/propane steam cracker unit producing 1000 kta ethylene and 288 kta propylene. Activities involved development of the ITB, contract exhibits, technology evaluation and contractor evaluation. Post-award resident with the licensor Linde Engineering in Munich, Germany and responsible as Process Supervisor for the development of the Basic Engineering Package, Environmental Information Report, process standards and guidelines. Resident at Samsung Engineering office in Seoul, South-Korea during the detailed engineering stage and relocated to site for the pre-commissioning and unit start-up. Responsibilities at site included acting as Unit Supervisor, Turnover Manager and assistent Project Manager.
